sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers. You can choose the appropriate BUILD32 and BUILD64 from the table at the bottom of the page.

screen.userinput: export BUILD32="[BUILD32 entries]" export BUILD64="[BUILD64 entries]" export GCCTARGET="[GCCTARGET entries]"
echo export BUILD32=\""${BUILD32}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export GCCTARGET=\""${GCCTARGET}\"" >> ~/.bashrc
